My 365 Project

I created my own application to manage my personal 'photograph a day project'. The application is integrated with Instagram's API, which allows me to add photographs to my project page by posting to Instagram with the specific hashtag of '#my365'. The application is built using Ruby and the Sinatra framework.

  • Date: January 2015
